text: The 1994 UCI Mountain Bike World Championships were held in Vail, Colorado, United States from 18 to 19 September 1994. ==Medal summary== ===Men's events=== {| |- |Cross-country | | | |- |Downhill | | | |- |Junior downhill | | | |} ===Women's events=== {| |- |Cross-country | | | |- |Downhill | | | |- |Junior downhill | | | |} ===Medal table=== ==References== ==External links== Category:UCI Mountain Bike World Championships 1994 UCI Mountain Bike World Championships UCI Mountain Bike World Championships Category:Mountain biking events in the United States
title: 1994 UCI Mountain Bike World Championships
